metadata.description: Portable Claude Code plugins for AI-agent-powered automation

plugins.name: core
plugins.description: Shared skills and utilities - setup, configuration, and common workflows

plugins.name: client-onboarding
plugins.description: Set up Slack channels and resources for new clients

plugins.name: demo-deploy
plugins.description: Deploy demo applications with GitHub integration and Traefik routing

plugins.name: diagrams
plugins.description: Generate diagrams in Draw.io, Mermaid, and ASCII formats from JSON or natural language

plugins.name: doc-gen
plugins.description: Document generation with WeasyPrint (HTML to PDF) and Pandoc (Markdown to DOCX) - includes Jinja2 templating and pre-built stylesheets

plugins.name: infrastructure
plugins.description: Manage team infrastructure with Cloudflare DNS/tunnels and Dokploy containers

plugins.name: leads
plugins.description: Scrape and verify sales leads via Apify, upload to Google Sheets

plugins.name: md-export
plugins.description: Export markdown to Google Docs and Word documents with Mermaid diagram rendering

plugins.name: n8n
plugins.description: Manage n8n workflows - list, deploy, activate, execute, and monitor

plugins.name: notion
plugins.description: Notion page, database, and block management - create pages, query databases, manage content blocks, and search workspace

plugins.name: proposal
plugins.description: Generate sales proposals and create Google Slides presentations from templates

plugins.name: slack
plugins.description: Slack channel and message management - create channels, retrieve messages, manage pins, canvases, and user groups

plugins.name: sop
plugins.description: Audio transcription and SOP extraction - convert interviews and recordings into structured procedures

plugins.name: tasks
plugins.description: Create and manage tasks in Notion - personal and agency workflows with field validation

plugins.name: ssh
plugins.description: Execute commands and transfer files on remote servers via SSH/SFTP

plugins.name: fireflies
plugins.description: Fireflies.ai meeting transcription - list meetings, get transcripts, summaries, action items, and speaker analytics

plugins.name: loom
plugins.description: Loom video transcription - get transcripts and comments from public Loom videos

plugins.name: fathom
plugins.description: Fathom Video integration - search meetings, get transcripts, and extract action items

plugins.name: meeting-intel
plugins.description: Meeting intelligence - extract entities, track decisions, action items, and build knowledge graphs from Fireflies, Loom, and Fathom transcripts

plugins.name: arise-bmad-extension
plugins.description: BMAD extension for AsyncAPI/CloudEvents-based modular architecture with n8n integration

plugins.name: gmail
plugins.description: Gmail and Google Tasks management - read emails, send messages, manage labels, drafts, and tasks

plugins.name: pandadoc
plugins.description: PandaDoc document generation and e-signatures - create contracts, proposals, and send for signing
